titleStmt.title: His Majesties speech delivered the twenty second of January, 1643. to the Members of the two Houses of Parliament at Oxford·
Speeches. 1644-01-22
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: A London counterfeit of this Oxford imprint has title "His Majesties speech delivered the twenty second of Ianuary, 1643. at Oxford" (Wing C2784B). The speech was also published as the first speech in "Two speeches delivered by His Maiestie to the Members of both Houses of Parliament assembled at Oxford" (Wing C2862).
The publication date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
